create a new upsetjs dash adapter

Source: R/dash.R
upsetjsDash.Rd

create a new upsetjs dash adapter

upsetjsDash(children = NULL, id = NULL, width = NULL, height = NULL)

Arguments

children

dash children

id

dash id

width

upsetjs width

height

upestjs height

Value

the set object

Examples

upsetjsDash("u") %>% fromList(list(a = c(1, 2, 3), b = c(2, 3)))
#> $props
#> $props$children
#> [1] "u"
#> 
#> $props$renderMode
#> [1] "upset"
#> 
#> $props$sets
#> $props$sets[[1]]
#> $name
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "set"
#> 
#> $elems
#> [1] 1 2 3
#> 
#> $cardinality
#> [1] 3
#> 
#> $color
#> NULL
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "upsetjs_set"
#> 
#> $props$sets[[2]]
#> $name
#> [1] "b"
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "set"
#> 
#> $elems
#> [1] 2 3
#> 
#> $cardinality
#> [1] 2
#> 
#> $color
#> NULL
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "upsetjs_set"
#> 
#> 
#> $props$combinations
#> $props$combinations[[1]]
#> $name
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "intersection"
#> 
#> $elems
#> [1] 1 2 3
#> 
#> $color
#> NULL
#>

#> [1] 3
#>

#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> $degree
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> attr(,"class")

#> 
#> $props$combinations[[2]]
#> $name
#> [1] "a&b"
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "intersect"
#> 
#> $elems
